Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Stockton/Wisconsin
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Stockton, Fullerton, Lincoln Park West, LaSalle and Stockton due to street blockage near Stockton/Wisconsin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Stockton, Fullerton, Lincoln Park West, LaSalle and Stockton due to street blockage near Stockton/Wisconsin..

Allow extra travel time.
